items.name: ListingPro - Directory & Listing WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: ListingPro is a complete solution for any type of directory/Listing theme.

items.description:
Get Lifetime All Access for ListingPro Premium Add-ons

ListingPro – #1 End-to-End WordPress Directory Solution

ListingPro is the most advanced and complete directory theme ever built for WordPress. With powerful features out of the box, it gives you everything you need to launch, manage, and scale a modern directory or listing business without relying on dozens of third-party plugins.

Built with a business-first approach, ListingPro covers everything from listing submission and advanced search to monetization and reviews—so you can focus on growing your platform instead of piecing together multiple solutions.

With its intuitive setup wizard, drag-and-drop customization, and 1-click demo imports, you can go from idea to live directory in just a few clicks. No coding required. No hidden costs. Just one theme, endless possibilities.

Whether your goal is to:

  • Create a local business hub for restaurants, salons, or gyms
  • Build a niche directory for doctors, lawyers, or freelancers
  • Launch a classified ads platform for real estate, cars, or jobs
  • Run a multi-city directory with powerful geolocation search

ListingPro adapts to your vision and scales with your business.

Why Choose ListingPro?

  • All-in-One Solution – No extra paid plugins required
  • 30,000+ Directories Worldwide – Trusted by entrepreneurs, startups, and agencies
  • Scalable Performance – Designed to handle thousands of listings
  • Drag & Drop Simplicity – Build stunning layouts without coding

Key Features

  • Advanced Search & Smart Filters – Auto-suggest, near me, open now & more
  • Front-End Submission – Users can add and manage their own listings
  • Monetization Ready – Charge for listings, ads, claims, leads, or memberships
  • Smart Reviews & Ratings – Multi-criteria ratings with spam protection
  • Events & Appointments – Built-in event management & booking system
  • Inbox & Messaging – Secure peer-to-peer communication
  • Coupons & Deals – Boost engagement with special offers
  • GDPR Ready – Fully compliant with privacy requirements
  • Powerful Admin Panel – Manage every detail with ease
  • Page Builder Support – Compatible with Elementor & WPBakery
  • Multi-Language Ready – Works with WPML & Polylang

Modern Design Options

  • Beautiful pre-built demo websites for multiple industries
  • Easy 1-click demo import to get started instantly
  • Unlimited layouts, colors & typography customization

Monetization Opportunities

  • Paid Listings & Subscriptions
  • Claim Listings
  • Pay-Per-Lead Model
  • Promoted Ads
  • Membership Packages

Optimized for Growth

  • 100% Mobile Responsive
  • Retina Ready Design
  • SEO Optimized
  • Fast & Scalable Performance

What’s Included

  • Full Theme Package
  • Lifetime Free Updates
  • Step-by-step Documentation
  • Dedicated Customer Support

Ready to Launch?

Build your dream directory today with ListingPro – the only WordPress theme you’ll ever need for directories and listings.

Get ListingPro Now and Launch Your Directory Business Today!

Do you also want me to create a short “feature highlights banner” block (with icons/emojis in a row) that Envato sellers often use at the very top to grab attention before the main description?

With the new free demos, you can create the following directories:
- Lawyers, Attorneys & Law Firms Directory Website
- Weddings Vendors Directory Website
- PetFinder Directory Website
- Black-Owned Businesses Directory Website
- CBDP Businesses Directory Website
- YellowPages Businesses Directory Website
- Automotive Businesses Directory Website



More Premium Add-Ons Available
- MedicalProWP – Doctors Marketplace add-on
- EventProWP – Events Marketplace add-on

For more information go to ListingProWP store

Check out all our available services here: https://listingprowp.com/services

What is ListingProWP?

ListingProWP is an end-to-end WordPress directory & listing solution and no extra paid plugins are required. An All-in-One turn-key solution to build and monetize your online directory in all 7 continents.

Top Features Features:

  • Advanced Search
  • Advanced Filter
  • Advanced Custom Form Fields for Listings
  • Front-End Submission (FES)
  • Listing Claim (Free and Paid)
  • Pricing Plan for Memberships
  • Multi-criteria Reviews & Ratings
  • Inbox for Internal Messaging
  • Ad Campaign to Promote Listings
  • Appointment Booking
  • Events Calendar, Cards & Listings
  • Coupons Cards Listings
  • Coupons Listings
  • User Dashboard
  • Admin Dashboard



    • Built-in checkout with Stripe, PayPal, 2CO, and Bankwire

    Free and paid payment gateway add-ons are available, including: PayFast, Paystack, Razorpay, PayU India, Mollie, eWAY, Mercadopago.

    Entrepreneurs who need to build an online business directory or listing website fast and within a bootstrap budget without coding knowledge. Also suitable for developers, freelancers, and web agencies.

Dear Valued Customer,
We hope this message finds you well.
We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by the recent ListingPro v2.9.7 update released yesterday. A minor issue was identified that caused a conflict with some child themes. This was due to an unintentional coding error on our end.
Our team acted swiftly, and we've now released a hotfix update v2.9.8 to resolve this conflict. We highly recommend updating to the latest version to ensure your site runs smoothly without any disruptions.
We truly appreciate your patience and understanding as we continuously work to provide you with the best possible experience.

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Medicare is a page wordpress theme made for Hospital. It is built on Bootstrap 3x and packed with great features, use of modern jQuery and CSS3 techniques to create superb eye-catching animations and make your visitors love you and your work. It is simple, modern and responsive.

items.description:
Medicare is a fully dynamic, well structured and beautiful Responsive WordPress Theme which is specifically designed for hospitals, health clinics, dentists and everyone else involved in health services. The Medicare Theme is responsive and highly customizable. Not only is it a highly suitable theme for doctors, dentists, stomatology, medical practices, hospitals, surgeons, health clinics, paediatrics, psychiatrist, veterinary clinics and other medical organizations related practices but it is also suitable for any kind of website – conference, environmental, charity, nonprofit, gym, political, activist, business and spa. Medicare is a WordPress theme created for medical websites with a clean, responsive layout. The theme includes a slider and wide range of elements and features created for medical-related sites, such as medical services, doctor information, a timetable and the ability to make appointments. It has purpose oriented design, responsive layout and comes with special features to manage appointment forms, facilities, services, doctors, department management and testimonials. It is suitable for users with zero programming skills as well as advanced developers.

CRAZY COOL FUNCTIONALITY

We have built in some of the coolest learning technology into Medicare that we think you are going to appreciate and adore.

By using short-codes, you can easily add these extra layers of functionality for a really immersive user experience, including ‘doctor hover’ which with a simple hover-over you can display more information about your individual doctor.

This is a great way to give additional details that your users will expect regarding different class offerings. Using a short-code you simply add to your page, complete the relevant class information and hit publish. Medicare takes care of the rest. Why not take a look for yourself right now?

items.name: AutoPro - Car Dealer WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: AutoPro is an exciting and intuitive, fresh-faced and youthful, charming and user-friendly, highly responsive WordPress automotive, car dealership and listings website theme. AutoPro is a flexible framework for webmasters with or without any previous website building experience to swiftly and effortlessly put together competent, professional websites where their potential customers and clients can easily and quickly find all the information they need in order for you to seal a sweet deal, right off your Auto Car website.

items.description:
AutoPro is a premium WordPress theme tailored for cars and vehicles, making it ideal for dealerships, agencies, and trading sites. It comes with a comprehensive set of features designed to enhance product showcases. The layout is highly flexible, offering moveable sidebars and unlimited color options, all within a minimalistic design that encourages personalization. The display supports both boxed and fullwidth modes, ensuring compatibility across all browsers and devices. AutoPro is geared towards businesses focused on sales and customer service.

It includes powerful tools such as a loan calculator and financial aid options. The WooCommerce plugin powers the shops and product displays, with additional features like test drive scheduling, purchase budget planning, and special information requests. Built on Twitter Bootstrap, it offers numerous elements and shortcodes, along with WPBakery Page Builder and Slider Revolution for exceptional visual appeal. AutoPro provides 8 homepage templates and 4 pre-built listing options, along with Contact Form 7 compatibility and thorough documentation. Custom support and one-click import are also included. Elevate your business with the smart choice of AutoPro.

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made , homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the Live Preview, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. Purchase your copy today, download the installation package and one-click installer guide you through the rest of the setup.

THEME FEATURES

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices.
  • One Click Demo Import – Easiest and fastest way to build your website, one click import pages, post, blog, products, revolution slider, widgets, theme options and more!
  • AutoPro Child Theme – Customize or tweak an existing WordPress theme without losing the ability to upgrade AutoPro theme.
  • WC Marketplace Compatible.
  • WC Vendors Compatible.
  • Ready for translation (.po / .mo files included).
  • Fully Customizable – Easily Change the color of every Element you see!
  • WooCommerce plugin included – This is the most popular WordPress eCommerce plugin. And it’s available for free. Packed full of features, perfectly integrated into your self-hosted WordPress website.
  • Contact Form 7 plugin – this theme includes Contact Form 7 plugin which allows you to manage all your contact forms.
  • Boxed or full width layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – Autopro uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the WPBakery Page Builder, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugins to easily add visuals to your website.

WHY SHOULD YOU CHOOSE AUTOPRO?

AutoPro is a WordPress theme that is focused on the vehicle and automobiles industry. It serves all car agencies, repair stores, dealerships and more. It comes with a clean code and full documentation to get started. AutoPro emphasizes on sales and or vehicle related service providing. Thus, it is compatible with WooCommerce and Contact Form 7. Shops include a quick preview and specs sections. AutoPro is Twitter Bootstrap based, making building customizations an easy thing. It also means that many shortcodes are included and thus coding skills are not required!

General design offers unlimited color options and both boxed and fullwidth modes support. You will receive 8 pre-built choices for homepages and 4 for listing! AutoPro is clean, smooth and professionally conceptualized offering WPBakery Page Builder as page builder. To make visual display amazing, you get Slider Revolution integration. Auto Pro special features include a budget and loan calculator and information requests. Requests for test drives, an account setting and refined searches are available too. AutoPro is 100% responsive and compatible with all screens, devices or browsers. This Jwsthemes product is powerful and checked on quality. Get it now and you will not regret it! Make your business rise with AutoPro!

  • Availability of the author to answer questions.

If you have any questions about customization of this template, which are not covered in the documentation feel free to ask a question in Support Center.

Save time and headaches. An installation service will setup your theme for free. Please, open a ticket to support center. We will assist to you.

THEME REVIEW – FAQ

Check out the review of the Car Dealer WordPress Theme.

  • Can the Car Dealer WordPress theme be used for single and multiple dealerships?

    Yes, the theme is very flexible and suits any car selling businesses, be it a single or multiple dealership. If you want to use the theme for a single dealership, you can simply disable the account login form. This way, nobody else will be able to create accounts and post car ads.

  • How many languages does the Car Dealer theme support?

    The current theme version is in English, but we are going to include additional languages in future theme updates. Nevertheless, the theme can be easily translated; it includes the needed PO files which can be translated to any other language using plugins like LocoTranslate.

  • Can I build a website that uses your Car Dealership WordPress theme and works with several languages?

    You can easily add a multilingual feature to your website using a plugin like WPML. This is the best solution for multilingual websites, so we made sure that the Car Dealer WordPress Theme is 100% compatible with WPML.

  • Can I use the purchased theme on several websites?

    Due to the single license policy, a purchased theme can be used on a single website. You will need to purchase the Car Dealer WordPress Theme again if you want to use it on another website.

  • Are the colors customizable on every field?

    You can easily customize the colors, making the theme fit your project and business’ color scheme. A custom CSS field is also included, allowing you to alter any specific element, and thus make it match your specific preferences.

  • Do you provide free install service of your Car Dealer WordPress theme?

    Yes, we provide a free service install demo data for you. After buy theme, you can open the ticket to our support center or open the topic to our community forums. We will check and import demo data.

  • Do you provide customizations of your Car Dealer WordPress theme?

    We do not provide theme customizations. However, we offer support for our products, so we will fix any bugs, errors, etc. You can always hire a programmer if you want to customize the theme for your needs, of course.

  • I have submitted a ticket on Saturday night. It’s Monday now, and I haven’t received a reply yet. How long should I wait?

    Our business hours are always posted at our tech support forum, so please make sure to check them. We really care about customer support services and guarantee to response to all support topics within 24 hours on weekday (a bit longer over weekend).

items.description:
Videoly — All-in-one Video WordPress Theme

Videoly is a WordPress theme suitable for bloggers, Youtubers & vloggers. This theme is brought to you by Elite Author, ThemeBubble. The best thing about Videoly theme is that, it has 9+ beautifully designed & ready-made templates. Plus, with the help of intuitive page builder (Visual Composer), you can modify your way to change the way the site is displayed without knowing a single line of code. The theme comes with a powerful admin panel that helps the users to stylize it the way they want. It’s as easy as it can get when it comes to UX. To show you how theme works, we have created 16+ thematic templates so you can see how amazing this product is. One may wonder why they should choose videoly over all the other WordPress theme for their own use. Let’s start off with few of the mentionable features:

Why to Choose Videoly ?

Homepage Demo:
A homepage expresses everything you need to know about the website in the first glance. Homepage shows our inner style. That’s why we gave you the option to choose from our 9 homepage variations to customize your homepage with your own sense of style that leaves the perfect impression.
Diferent hero types:
Videoly offers over 6 different hero sliders to choose from. The layers and sliders are unique from each other and of course it is customizable.
Wordpress Customizer:
Customize the theme with your desired fashion as Videoly offers WordPress customizer with it. Best part about this is, you will always have a unique website theme by customizing it.
Fully Responsive:
Videoly is made in such way so that it responses 100% to make your website look good in any devices and resolution. Not every website has this awesome feature. Grab it now!
Retina Ready:
We have made Videoly compatible with any display ready. Especially Retina display ready. You can view your beautiful website made with this WordPress theme in any retina display.
Google font Options:
Along with huge variations of layout and sliders, Videoly offers more than 500 Google fonts. Hundreds of free, open source fonts from google and they are really fast in rendering also.
Header & Navigation Style:
Various beautiful header and navigation options available just to match your taste. Choose the one that screams your personality.
Blog Layout:
Chic and tasteful blog layout with different type of blog post formats like image, slider, gallery, video and quote. Now you can totally fall in love with your own website.
Speed Optimized:
Videoly is optimized for speed with careful attention to clean and structured code. It helps improve conversation rates.
Bootstrap 3.3.7:
Bootstrap is the most popular framework for developing. It makes front-end web development faster and easier. For Videoly, we used the bootstarp 3.3 version which keeps the site up to date.
Quick Install and Setup:
As we all hate anything that is slow. That’s why we came up with such a feature where you won’t have to wait for installation. Very quick and easy installation. Quickly install the theme in WordPress or via FTP. Proper Documentation is also available for installation and setup.
Visual Composer:
Visual Composer is a visual page builder widely used and highly rated editor that allows you to create layouts, style it and add your content easily.
Cool Readymade Layouts:
For you to create beautiful website as desired, we have included lots of page layouts. Design your website with blog, videos and other contents.
Contemporary Design:
Videoly has a striking balance between up-to-date designs and functionality. The theme was made after a proper consideration of the latest style. Each demo is designed and crafted carefully.
SEO Optimized:
We designed and developed the templates of Videoly templates considering SEO best practices with W3C validated code and optimized code. Now you can have your website with the best SEO optimization.
Compatible with All Browser & Devices:
The theme is thoroughly tested with all the latest browsers and devices to make sure it looks and works better everywhere. It is absolutely compatible with all the browsers and devices.
WPML Multilingual Ready:
We have done required template settings to make Videoly compatible with WPML and tested it to make sure it works fine. Now it works fine with different languages.
Social Sharing:
It has the template setting for social sharing. We tested to make sure it is a smart website that you own.
Page/Post Customization:
With Videoly you can easily customize your specific page or post on the top of the default theme settings in case if you want to emphasis any page/post or need different style for your overall website.
One Click Demo Installation:
With the help of new technology, now you just need to click one button to import all of our demo, content like pages, posts, sliders, widgets, theme settings etc and change them as per your requirements.
Completely Customizable:
As you start using Videoly, you will see a lot of options available to customize your desired demo layout using our theme options and visual composer to make your website look unique and amazing!
Lifetime Free Updates:
We care about our customers and we understand that lagging behind the updated world is disappointing. But sometimes updates cost a lot of money. That’s why we offer free updates for the lifetime period. We love to stay attached to our customer, so we provide timely updates and add new features to make Videoly more helpful to our customers.
Creative Elements Shortcodes:
Plenty of pre-built shortcodes available to use all available different theme elements in any of your website page with maximum customization possibilities.
Unlimited Color Options:
To make color changes easy, we have implemented color picker in theme settings. You can choose your desired colors visually and by hash code and RGB code also wherever required. No plainer, boring website.
Child Theme:
Child theme is recommended if you want to customize the theme, so we have already included child theme. Just download it the same way as the parent theme and customize it according to your convenience.
Typography Setting:
Along with more than 650 google web fonts, we have included all the standard fonts for our theme main and alternate font. You can change font size. Font family, font color and line heights.
Custom CSS:
Add you custom CSS via theme options if you are up to adding some extraordinary customization. These custom CSS will overwrite theme default CSS and will retain on theme upgrade. It is one of the best parts of Videoly.
W3 Total Cache Ready:
To make our theme compatible with W3 Total Cache plugin to make your website load fast, we have taken care of the coding. Check our demo to feel the optimized page loading speed.
Unlimited Sidebars:
Another mentionable feature of Videoly is it allows you to add unlimited sidebars as per your requirement and assign many numbers of your choice of widgets to them. Amazingly, you can even switch the placement of the sidebars wherever you want to very easily.
Powerful Admin Panel:
We have used Redux framework which is an advanced and widely used admin panel to make available theme changes easily and quickly. Things you can change in one click in the theme like fonts, custom css, layouts and so on.
5-Star Quick & Responsive Support:
We love our customers and would always do our level best for their satisfaction. Customer’s satisfaction is our growth. We have our highly experienced team of technical experts who try their best to respond within one business day. Our motto is to give our customers satisfactory, helpful and polite answers.
Video Tutorial& Detailed Documentation:

We have made sufficient videos with detailed information and documentation to make our users aware about all the parts of our theme. In addition there are many how-to videos available for fast understanding.

Drag & Drop Page Builder – WPBakery Page Builder

Built with SEO in mind

items.description:
KaraMat is a modern, clean and professional multi-purpose WordPress WooCommerce theme, It is fully responsive, it looks stunning on all types of screens and devices. It is super for fashion shop, supermarket or any other categories. KaraMat is powered by entirely by WordPress, WooCommerce and deeply compatible with Multi-vendor and Marketplace plugins like WC Vendors, Dokan Plugin that helps you create multi-vendor sites with ease.

The premium theme comes with 04 homepages, lots of layout options and many cool eCommerce features such as visual page builder, revolution slider, Ajax cart/wishlist/compare, quick view light box, ajax quick search, product image zoom/gallery, video thumbnail gallery for product, variation swatch and image for WooCommerce, social login and more.

MULTIVENDOR MARKETPLACE COMPATIBILITY

Be compatible with the WC Vendor plugin named WC Vendor – Multi Vendor Marketplace WooCommerce Plugin, you can totally create a market with variety products from different providers. One special thing is that this theme supports specific mobile layouts.This integration will bring to customer many benefits in experiencing your website, now you totally yourself can create a unique e-commerce for your business.

Just by some clicks, you completely see this theme with powerful features as following!

ONE CLICK DEMO IMPORT

All of the beautiful pre-made , homepages, demos, templates and page setups you can see here in the Live Preview, are ready to be yours at the simple click of a button. Purchase your copy today, download the installation package and one-click installer guide you through the rest of the setup.

Purely a marketing theme, not only the design is traditional according to the niche but also the scripts and features are wonderful. Well done – a new and fresh air in Finance related themes.

– by webinane

THEME FEATURES

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices.
  • Multi-vendor Marketplace support.
  • One Click Demo Import – Easiest and fastest way to build your website, one click import pages, post, blog, products, revolution slider, widgets, theme options and more!
  • KaraMat Child Theme – Customize or tweak an existing WordPress theme without losing the ability to upgrade KaraMat theme.
  • Boxed or full width layout – This can be set globally or even per page!
  • Built on Twitter Bootstrap – KaraMat uses Twitter Bootstrap. This means that a range of shortcodes are automatically supported. For ease of use you can use the Visual Composer, Easy Bootstrap Shortcode or any other plugins to easily add visuals to your website.
  • Built with Less .css

  • Demo content included!

items.description:
Single Product WordPress Theme to Make Online Selling Website

Incredible user experience, Flaky is the top priority of single product website owners. Designed with the modern technique of 2025 graphics and trends, this WooCommerce WordPress theme has all the features to make an SEO-oriented online shopping website. This e-commerce theme can be customized with Elementor page builder. The utilitarian design comes from a blend of the finest modern features and research-based ultra-modern functionalities with a tinge of classics. In literally minutes, you can build a personalized super fast responsive shopping website

There is one outstanding home page layout with ‘total’ uniqueness and specialty, so you can give a true sense of quality to different product brands. Use unlimited custom options at the backend to edit the layout or build a completely new one.

Features unique to Flaky include start-up popups for Product Deal, MailChimp Subscription Form, and Login Prompt (Login directly or through 30+ social media websites). You can also build a product promotion blog in 6 styles with 11 Detail Page styles. Similarly, there 4+ styles for Category Listing and 6+ designs for Product Details.

items.name: Ed School: Education WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Ed School  Elementary, Middle and Highschool WordPress Theme

items.description:
Bold design, innovative features, developed for education/academic websites from Elementary through to High School, Ed School is the obvious choice.

Websites Using Ed WordPress Theme

  • http://libt.co.uk/
  • http://julesverne.edu.rs/sr/
  • https://athlosstcloud.org/
  • http://oakpromise.us/
  • http://www.ansgargymnasiet.se/
  • http://angelsfield.com/montessori/
  • http://geepreparatory.com/
  • http://bjipreschool.org/
  • http://www.helpmegrowky.com/
  • http://www.lumossaltlake.com/
  • http://www.skolier.com/
  • http://mtkenyaacademy.ac.ke/
  • http://www.bedfordpark.ca/
  • http://shildeg.edu.mn/
  • http://leftwichprimarydemo.co.uk/
  • http://www.greatriverchristianschool.org/wordpress/

Ed School is for School Websites

Designed and developed with experience in building websites for school users ‘Ed School’ is filled with the useful kinds of features you need to easily create a beautiful fluid, modern school websites. Feature Teacher and Tutor Profiles, ramp up your social media efforts or schedule and manage your School’s events with the events calendar for WordPress – all from within a familiar and easy to use WordPress Dashboard. Teamed up with the powerful Theme Options Panel for Ed School and the skies are the limit.

Create with WPBakery Page Builder & Slider Revolution

MIssing something? Dreaming of the ultimate tweak or creating the perfect we element that you want to reuse on other pages? No problem. Take your website to the next level with Ed School plus your bundled copy of the #1 Drag & Drop Page Builder, WPBakery Page Builder PLUS Slider Revolution. You can create almost any web element thinkable with the Drag & Drop simplicity of the #1 top selling plugin for WordPress, WPBakery Page Builder. Teamed up with Slider Revolution – as they say, it’s not just a slider plugin, it’s a new way to deliver ideas. Create beautiful content in a creative way whether it’s a Slider, Carousel, Hero Scene or full page animated slider, with the powerhouse Drag & Drop Editor, Slider Revolution has you covered.

Modern, Responsive Design

Everything from our huge Mega Menu, Footer options, Typography and of course layout have been meticulously crafted, coded and developed with today’s modern devices in mind. Bring your school website up to speed with a thoroughly responsive design and never worry about device compatibility for your students again.

Creative Headers & Footers

Sometimes the difference between an average website, and an awesome website that teachers, students and parents remember, talk about and use is as simple as a well designed header. A good header is the entry point to your user experience, how a person will navigate, find and use your website. It’s so important and often forgotten about. Not so with Ed School! With the ease of drag and drop via WPBakery Page Builder, you have access to over 80 different elements to create the ultimate user experience via your header (and footer!). Be bold and creative, yet intuitive and ultimately usable. Your scholars will love you for it.

Stunning Easy to Use Demos

We haven’t gone down the ‘ultimate bundle, mega super everything and the kitchen sink multipurpose website blah blah’ path with Ed School. We’ve taken the less is more approach by researching what makes a great scholastic website and designing for that niche specifically. With that in mind we have built two very purposeful complete Homepage Demos that we think you will love. You can start from there, tweak it a little, add your own content and images and be ready to punch out a professional website quickly and easily. On top of that we think you will find the additional inner page layouts super useful too, because they have been tailored for education websites. It just makes sense. Take a look at the demos now.

Bundled Plugins

It makes sense to include the right plugins that extend functionality because you don’t want compatibility issues later on. So we built Ed School with the best of the best plugins already checked and integrated to guarantee you won’t have compatibility issues. This includes the powerful Contact Form 7 for awesome webforms, Tribe Events Plugin for an easy to use events calendar and more.

No Programming Required

All of this and more, right off the shelf is ready to use and help you create an awesome school website without programming a single line of code.

Support

  • Availability of the author to answer questions
  • Answering technical questions about item’s features

items.name: Listio - Directory Listing & Real Estate WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Listio Real State WordPress Theme

items.description:
Listio is a perfect Real Estate WordPress Theme with a modern, clean, fully functional. Listio is perfect for the agents and agencies. We have included Visual Composer with lot’s of extended addons as well. Listio fully responsive and looks great on major devices such as desktop, mobile, tab, IOS etc and the browsers such as Chrome, Safari, IE, Firefox, Opera, etc.

Demo

username: simon
password: simon_123

  • Modern And Clean Design
  • Responsive Design

  • Bootstrap 3 Framework
  • Custom Colors
  • Easy To Customize
  • WPML Plugin Compatibility
  • Cross-browser Compatible
  • HTML5 Markup
  • Google Map Integration
